reasoning: Aggregate BOTEC estimate summing major neuromuscular categories: motor neuron diseases (ALS/SMA ~2-3 per 100k), muscular dystrophies (~3-5 per 100k), peripheral neuropathies (~10-20 per 100k), myasthenia gravis (~0.3-0.5 per 100k), myositis (~1-2 per 100k), other myopathies (~5-10 per 100k). Total ~25 per 100k. Low confidence due to heterogeneity, significant geographic variation, and overlap between categories.
